subject: RE: [junit] testing XML APIs
msgSnippet: AmudhaK, By XML API, you mean XML Documents? Or java code which generates XML. If you can give us sample code then we would have a better idea of its
messageBody:
AmudhaK,
By XML API, you mean XML Documents? Or java code which generates XML.
If you can give us sample code then we would have a better idea of its
testability.

Thanks,
-Kamal

-----Original Message-----
From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of
Amudha Karuppannan
Sent: Wednesday, July 05, 2006 9:42 AM
To: 'junit@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: [junit] testing XML APIs


Hello all,

I just want to know whether we can test XML APIs using junit.

Thanks and regards,
AmudhaK
